name: The Persistence of Whatever
description:
Created for ART107 (Spring 2022 SJSU)

This project was made by Team Sugarcoat which contains themes of Surrealism and Neon Pink things. These are things created from our imagination and we hope you enjoy our world!

To exit the game, use the door inside of the city. Walking through the door will "wake you up". 

Please click the download link to see our world (obviously)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Keyboard Controls
WASD - Move 
WASD + SHIFT - Run
Mouse - Camera Controls
SPACE - Jump

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Created by Team Sugarcoat
Lead Unity Dev - Santino Santos
Concept/Project Dev - Risa Kawakita
Environment Design/Planning Design - Michael Rodriguez
Assistant Unity Dev/Lead Interaction Designer - Steven Canoy

Secret: The reason why everything is black and white on this page is that you are not truly "dreaming". When you play the game, you get to experience the colorful, dreamful world that we created. However, what is even real? That is up to you...
